story.book.controller

Class OnlineStoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.controller.StoryController
      • story.book.controller.OnlineStoryController

  • public class OnlineStoryController
extends StoryController
    StoryController to read and download locally stored stories. This controller interfaces with the IO and ES clients.
    Author:
    Alexander Cheung

      Checks if an SID already exists in a locally stored Story.

      Sets the current application Story to the story with the specified SID using the ESClient.

      Returns an ArrayList of StoryInfo from the server using the ESClient.

      Saves the current application Story to local storage after checking for and resolving SID conflicts.

      Returns an ArrayList of StoryInfo for stories matching the specified search term from the server using the ESClient.

      • checkSIDConflict

        private void checkSIDConflict(int SID)
        Checks if an SID already exists in a locally stored Story. If there is a conflict, it is resolved by changing the SID of the locally stored Story to a new SID.
        Parameters:
        SID - the SID being checked for
